tasks.title: Debug docs navigation state regression
tasks.description: frontend-ui benchmark scenario: Debug docs navigation state regression.

workflow.goal: Localize the highest-impact code paths quickly.
workflow.prompt: Triage task: Debug docs navigation state regression. Identify the primary modules and likely risk hotspots.

workflow.goal: Trace control/data flow across the relevant components.
workflow.prompt: Investigate task: Debug docs navigation state regression. Follow request-to-effect flow and find likely failure/regression points.

workflow.goal: Define verification criteria and regression checks.
workflow.prompt: Validate task: Debug docs navigation state regression. List tests and checks that prove the issue is solved without regressions.
